entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT, Edson
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:39 a.m. MDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, 7.6Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Edson Airport 5:00 AM MDT Saturday 6 May 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: 7.6°C

Visibility: 16 km
Humidity: 55 %

entry.title: Saturday: Smoke. High 18.
entry.summary: Widespread smoke. Wind east 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this morning. High 18. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers overnight. Widespread smoke. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 this evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Widespread smoke. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 14. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Saturday 6 May 2023
